Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Maximus and St. Dometius:

Text.Language: Hiten nie~u,/: n~te nao#c# n~io] m~mainous/ri: Maximoc nem Dometioc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of my lords and fathers who love their children, Maximus and Dometius, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
